attributes.action: Have Parish councils approve MP Expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parish Councils are well placed to understand the effectiveness of MP's and act as representatives of the people. 

They should therefore check and approve expense claims of MPs

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead, which covers a similar issue: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MPsExp/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
